Entry.JapaneseText: しっかし……試練とは言え、 イヤなもん、見ちまったな……
Entry.EnglishText: Man... Even though it was just a trial, I saw some awful stuff...

Entry.JapaneseText: あんた、何を見せられたの？
おれが知ってるのとは正反対の、 種族差別と偏見だらけのペトナジャンカさ。
Entry.EnglishText: I was shown a Petnadjanka full of racism and prejudice, completely different from the one that I know.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……姉貴がガジュマに 殺されるところまで見せられてさ……
Entry.EnglishText: And I saw my sister get killed by a Gajuma...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あんた、そんなのを見た後に、 あんな事言ったの……？
Entry.EnglishText: Even after seeing that, you could still say things like that?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ……みんなが同じ種族になれば、争いも なくなるかも、なんて思ったりしたけど……
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, I did wonder if there would be no more conflict if everyone were to become the same race, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……何が大事かって考えたら、 自然と答が出たって言うか……な。
Entry.EnglishText: ...When I thought about what was really important, the answer came to me naturally... You feel me?
